amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-386 to limit the scope of H.R. 4167 in order to preserve state authorities that help defend and respond to bioterrorism attacks. Specifically, when a Governor or state legislature certifies that a state authority is useful inestablishing or maintaining a food supply that is adequately protected frombioterrorism attack, the state authority is not affected by the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 255 (Roll no. 28).
